mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_ORDER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_ORDER (ID, MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_SEQ_ID, CUST_ID, USER_NAME_TEXT, CERT_TYPE, CERT_ID, RECHARGE_CODE, RECEI_BANK_CODE, PAYMENT_BANK_CODE, CARD_NAME, CARD_NO, ORDER_AMT, STATUS, AUDIT_STATUS, AUDIT_MSG, ORDER_DATE, RECHARGE_NO, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, FIRST_CHECKER, FINAL_CHECKER, CHECK_STATUS, IS_CALLBACK, CALLBACK_DATE, RESV, BUSINESS_TYPE, PAYMENT_ID, PAYEE_CUST_ID, PAYEE_CUST_NAME, TRADE_TYPE, WITHDRAW_TYPE, ORGANIZATION_ID, NOTICE_TARGET, USER_ID, VALID_STATUS, PROTOCOL_ID, CREATE_CUST_ID, FUNDCERTFICATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNameText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstChecker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalChecker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCallback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callbackDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payeeCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{protocolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundcertficate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
